section.description: See how Sawtic AI is transforming real estate businesses across the Emirates

testimonials.name: Ahmed Al-Rashid
testimonials.testimonial: Sawtic AI recovered 40% more leads for us. We closed 12 extra deals last month just from calls we would have missed!

testimonials.name: Sarah Mitchell
testimonials.testimonial: Our AI agent handles property inquiries better than our best junior agent. Clients love the 24/7 availability.

testimonials.name: Omar Hassan
testimonials.testimonial: ROI was incredible - paid for itself in the first month. Now I can focus on closing while AI handles all inquiries.
